items.comment: Generic mid 2010s action movie. Script is really subpar for a Guy Ritchie . Stunts aren't the best what Hollywood can offer . Humor is more often miss than hit . Statham plays the same role for the last 15y…. Most characters are underused and underdeveloped….Good to see Josh Harnet and Hugh Grant.
Hard to wrong with a Jason Statham/Guy Ritchie movie!  The bonus of this movie is Aubrey Plaza! What a great character she portrayed! Hope to see her in more big movies!

the references to actors previous iconic movie roles were great. plaza was perfect for the role. grant played the lecherous arms dealer wonderfully. this will be horribly under rated if judged on action genre points alone. this is a clever comedy, and needs to be watched more than once to catch all the hidden delights.
One of Gut Ritchies best.. such good casting and locations. Just gorgeous.
don't go by that tomato meter, this movie is great
Another fun Guy Ritchie film with a fantastic cast.  I'd definitely recommend it.

It's a pretty solid movie and a lot simpler than the best Guy Ritchie movies but I also thoroughly enjoyed it. Aubrey Plaza and Carey Elwes were standouts, the editing added a lot to the humor, and the movie is just fun.

It feels almost like this was a retooled successor to The Man From UNCLE and while not as good as that movie, it's still fun and entertaining.
Very entertaining...the critics are so out of touch with regular people
This movie was hilarious, I am surprised its not getting better reviews.
Simply amazing and Jason Statham's nailed it again after the previous Wrath of Man movie!! The jam packed actions scene with really good scores and not to be mentioned the Cinematography👍🏻👍🏻
Started kinda OK but got very boring very quickly, this movie should be only half as long as it is.

IN THIS OPERATION, 
EVERYONE HAS A PART TO PLAY

Operation Fortune: Ruse de Guerre is a 2023 spy action comedy film directed by Guy Ritchie 🔫

It's ok, but I feel mixed about this one 😉
I'd recommend it if you like this genre, but if not then probably give it a miss 👍🏼👎🏼

Special agent Orson Fortune and his team of operatives recruit one of Hollywood's biggest movie stars to help them on an undercover mission when the sale of a deadly new weapons technology threatens to disrupt the world order.
Was fun and always good to see Jason.
This was an awesome movie. The pace was excellent and the one liners were hilarious. You can't go wrong with Guy Ritchie and Jason Statham.
Great humour and just a fun film
BORING FILM...THE SAME THINGS....
We had fun. Always love seeing Jason fight!
Not Ritchie’s best work by far but still an enjoyable watch.
Good but needs more action
Very cliche and cringe
